channel.title: Summoning Help
channel.description:
Alright So I Am trying to add The rest of the summoning pouchs to; Buttonhandler This is the Code I Am using for steel titan [code] case 387: SummonTrain.CreatePouch(player, 33, 178,12160,1115, -1,12021,576); break;[/code]
My Problem Is, I Don't Understand The Numbers.
33 -1 576 (This one is my Main Concern)
Other than that i have added to Pouch To Work. Although The " Steel Titan " Pouch Is Still Grey, When i make the Pouch.
My Guesses are, That 576 is The incorrect Number for the New Pouch Interface? :L I Plan on Adding All Pouchs, Perhaps Releasing If Not Released.
Could Anyone Perhaps Tell Me what i am Doing Wrong? Or Point me in the right direction?
Thanks in regards.
Dakota

item.title: Summoning Help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

If you look at the definition for

SummonTrain.CreatePouch(player, 33, 178,12160,1115, -1,12021,576);

You’ll see what each of the number represent.

Read full topic

item.description:
@frison wrote:

Yes Please, That Might Help!(:

item.description:

i can give you my summoning pouch code if you’d like you might be able to see if anything is wrong or just use mine and adjust it if it needs to be adjusted

Alright So I Am trying to add The rest of the summoning pouchs to; Buttonhandler
This is the Code I Am using for steel titan
